title: The Spy's Son - Snap Classic
description: The story of a lifetime falls into a reporter’s lap when he receives a tip about father-son co-conspirators who sell national secrets to Russia.
itunes:title: The Spy's Son - Snap Classic
itunes:subtitle: Bryan Denson was a court reporter for The Oregonian newspaper in Portland. It could be mind-numbing work sitting in the cheap seats of the American justice system. But then one day he got a tip about an espionage case coming in. The defendant was 24-year
author: paloma.orozco@prx.org (Snap Judgment and PRX)
